sect1.title: Streams Dir API Reference
sect1.para: The functions listed in this section work on local files, as well as remote files (provided that the wrapper supports this functionality!).

refnamediv.refpurpose: Open a directory for file enumeration

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: php_stream_opendir returns a stream that can be used to list the files that are contained in the directory specified by path. This function is functionally equivalent to POSIX opendir. Although this function returns a php_stream object, it is not recommended to try to use the functions from the common API on these streams.

refnamediv.refpurpose: Fetch the next directory entry from an opened dir

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: php_stream_readdir reads the next directory entry from dirstream and stores it into ent. If the function succeeds, the return value is ent. If the function fails, the return value is NULL. See php_stream_dirent for more details about the information returned for each directory entry.

refnamediv.refpurpose: Rewind a directory stream to the first entry

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: php_stream_rewinddir rewinds a directory stream to the first entry. Returns 0 on success, but -1 on failure.

refnamediv.refpurpose: Close a directory stream and release resources

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: php_stream_closedir closes a directory stream and releases resources associated with it. Returns 0 on success, but -1 on failure.
